Articles.Content:
I feel like this has probably already been a topic of discussion, but since I haven't been able to find much relating to it, I thought I would post something on the subject.

With the recent .25 update every part relating to the Mk II has been completely renovated, now I was wondering if there were plans along the same lines for the Mk III parts? I started really thinking about it as I looked at this big list of Mk II parts to choose from yet, on the other hand, only finding 3 parts in-game (stock) for the Mk III, that and the fact that the Mk 2-3 adapter does not fully align with any Mk II parts anymore.

I feel like this has probably already been a topic of discussion, but since I haven't been able to find much relating to it, I thought I would post something on the subject.

I started really thinking about it as I looked at this big list of Mk II parts to choose from yet, on the other hand, only finding 3 parts in-game (stock) for the Mk III, that and the fact that the Mk 2-3 adapter does not fully align with any Mk II parts anymore.

Yep. They were supppsed to be in 0.25 but got pushed back to 0.90. The Mark III was less developed than Spaceplane+ so it stands to reason it needs more work.
They arent going to undo intern hugos work are they?
